title: Peter's First Sermon
description:
Readings from:
Acts 2:14-18,21-24,38
Today's passages were read by Gustavo Rendón Yánez. Gustavo is a musician & Chairman of the Board of Christian Education at The United Christian Church in Caracas, Venezuela.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
